name: SpiritistRadioPortuguese
0:
”Alexa, open spiritist radio portuguese”
”Alexa, ask spiritist radio portuguese for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start spiritist radio portuguese”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spiritist radio portuguese
des:
Radio Espirita is the Spiritist' Radio portuguese channel. 
24/7 music, lectures, programs all about Spiritism. 
Spiritist Radio operations is located in Atlanta/Georgia/USA. As a non-profit, Spiritist Radio has the mission of spreading Spiritism in English. 
Also listen to Radio Espirita for Spiritist content in Portuguese using this skill - Spiritist Radio Portuguese.
To listen Spiritist Radio English channel use the Alexa Skill - Spiritist Radio.
Know more about us at spiritistradio.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
